an6.25:1.4: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an6.25:1.5: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.25:1.6: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.25:1.8: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visujjhanti. (1)
an6.25:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dhammaṃ anussarati:
an6.25:2.3: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako dhammaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.25:2.4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.25:2.6: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visujjhanti. (2)
an6.25:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako saṅghaṃ anussarati:
an6.25:3.3: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako saṅghaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.25:3.4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.25:3.6: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visujjhanti. (3)
an6.25:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako attano sīlāni anussarati akhaṇḍāni …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
an6.25:4.2: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako sīlaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.25:4.3: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.25:4.5: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visujjhanti. (4)
an6.25:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako attano cāgaṃ anussarati:
an6.25:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako devatā anussarati:
an6.25:6.2: ‘santi devā cātumahārājikā, santi devā tāvatiṃsā, santi devā yāmā, santi devā tusitā, santi devā nimmānaratino, santi devā paranimmitavasavattino, santi devā brahmakāyikā, santi devā tatuttari.
an6.25:6.3: Yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā;
an6.25:6.4: mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena … sutena … cāgena … paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā; mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī’ti.
an6.25:7.1: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti;
an6.25:7.2: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā.
an6.25:7.4: Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ karitvā evam’idhekacce sattā visujjhanti. (6)
